mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admins ( admin_id, admin_password, authority_level, admin_name, admin_email, admin_mobile, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{enc_password}, #{authority_level}, #{name}, #{email}, #{mobile}, NOW() )
